entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is a person who is talking to Harry. He mentions his mother's funeral and his brother Albus.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is Aberforth's brother, who went on a trip around the world with Doge but came back for their mother's funeral.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is Albus and Aberforth's pet dog.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one listening to Aberforth talk. He wonders how long it has been since Aberforth spoke about this.

entities.name: aberforth's mother
entities.description: Aberforth's mother passed away and her funeral was attended by Albus and Doge.

relationships.description: Aberforth is talking about his brother Albus.
Aberforth mentions that Doge went off on his own after their mother's funeral.
